'''Andreas Andersson''' is a former customer support agent at [[Mojang Studios]]. Before joining the company, he went under the alias ''Blurplurp'' (or ''Blurpi'') and created videos for his YouTube channel of the same name.

On September 1, 2015, Andersson announced his departure from Mojang.<ref>{{tweet|BlurpiAndy|638648000655564800|First day as a free agent. I wonder what adventure I will embark upon next. #FreeAgent #LookingForWork|September 1, 2015}}</ref>
